attributes.action: Change the new Defence review that claimed that terrorism is the only threat to the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I think that during such events as the occupation of Georgia by Russia, as well as its recent Naval commitment to rearm its fleet with new nuclear weapons and six aircraft carriers, that it is totally irresponsible to claim that terrorism is Britains only threat, and to use this as a reason to reduce the armed forces.
The fact is that in todays World, as the government itself has said things are unpredictable and uncertain and either way, with our Countries huge wealth we can afford to have prepared and powerful armed forces, for the public would agree that it is better to have them and not need them, than like in 1939, to need them and not have them.
